brief: Norway's Olympic medal hunt intensifies: Boe brothers eye biathlon relay glory.
Klaebo chases second gold in 50km epic; Johaug returns in 10km classic.
Liverpool's title charge continues at Sunderland; Arsenal top the table.

radar: Viktor Hovland tees off Thursday at Pebble Beach, aiming to build form ahead of the Masters. The scenic California tournament is a strong early-season test for the Norwegian star.
Casper Ruud's Australian swing continues as the tennis season heats up. With clay season approaching, the Roland Garros finalist will look to find rhythm in the coming weeks.
